prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Guitar, Piano, Bass, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1: Reed, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Drums are the instruments featured in this song, but Brass is absent.

Style 2: This composition is comprised of Reed, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Drums, but Brass is not included.

Style 3: This piece is performed with Reed, Guitar, Piano, Bass, and Drums, omitting Brass.
